import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' export default class ReatApi extends Component { //Mounting for state_Calls constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { users:[], } } //Mounting for RESTAPI_Calls componentDidMount() { axios .get('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users') .then( (result)=>this.setState({ users:result.data }) ) } //Mounting for Output Preparation render() { var { pathname } =this.props.location console.log(this.props) return (<>

USERS RestAPI Data

{ this.state.users.map( (res,index)=> { return() }) }
{res.id} {res.name} {res.username} {res.email} View
) } }
